DOC.brief_summary: This study plan evaluate emotional disorder treatment interferon ( IFN ) beta relapse remit multiple sclerosis ( RRMS ) subject . This open-label exploratory study change therapeutic behavior standardize neuropsychologic follow-up .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Emotional Disorders During Treatment Interferon Beta Relapsing-remitting Multiple Sclerosis Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This study plan evaluate emotional disorder treatment IFN beta RRMS subject . This open-label , prospective , interventional , multicentric study change therapeutic behavior standardize neuropsychologic follow-up . Subjects undergo 13 evaluation ( categorical dimensional evaluation ) , 3 evaluation perform treatment ( Baseline , Day 7 15 ) 10 evaluation treatment ( Month 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 , 5 , 6 , 9 , 12 , 18 24 ) .
